section.title: Remove Shutdown User Account
section.para: Removes the shutdown system account so that only a root login can shutdown the system. As a general precaution, it is recommended that you remove this system account. The more accounts that are present on the system, the more opportunities an attacker has to gain access or information about your system.
It is recommended to apply this module unless the shutdown user account is required by your system.

listitem.para: CC-3 - Secure Configurations for Hardware and Software on Laptops, Workstations, and Servers
GEN000000-LNX00320 - The system must not have special privilege accounts, such as shutdown and halt.
